text:
Induced miscarriages (termination of
pregnancy) could have been done through legal or illegal sources. Consider physical trauma and domestic
violence as a cause. See chapter on Gender-Based Violence.
• Refer women with three consecutive first trimester or two consecutive midtrimester losses to a regional hospital
for workup before the next pregnancy
• Progesterone therapy is available at hospital level for women with recurrent early losses (see chapter on preterm
labour as well as the STG hospit
